Text:
The only problem with this bar is that once you try it you can't seem to do without it, it tastes that good.
Dr. OZ mentioned these bars on his show so we thought we would try one, WOW! we love them.
This particular one, (KIND PLUS Dark Chocolate Cherry Cashew) if you read the ingredients you will find not one thing that is bad for you. Finally a treat that won't harm you......unless you eat about six a day...(calories)
We checked quite a few places that handle this product and Amazon is by far the best price.
